Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute near Harrison/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted WB: Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Kostner and Harrison; EB: Congress Parkway, Kostner, Jackson, Cicero and Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Harrison and Kolmar, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Kostner and Harrison

Eastbound buses will operate via Congress Parkway, Kostner, Jackson, Cicero and Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Armitage. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Armitage.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
